00049 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 #define RAMDISK_NUM             (2)
00051 
00052 #define RAMDISK0_ID             (0)
00053 #define RAMDISK0_MemorySize     (512 * 3 + 1024 * 3)    /* FAT Table + Memory Size                          */
00054 #define RAMDISK0_BlockSize      (512)
00055 #define RAMDISK0_BlockCount     (RAMDISK0_MemorySize / RAMDISK0_BlockSize)
00056 #define RAMDISK0_AddressMode    (BOT_ADDR_MODE_BYTE)
00057 
00058 #define RAMDISK1_ID             (1)
00059 #define RAMDISK1_MemorySize     (512 * 3 + 1024 * 3)    /* FAT Table + Memory Size                          */
00060 #define RAMDISK1_BlockSize      (512)
00061 #define RAMDISK1_BlockCount     (RAMDISK1_MemorySize / RAMDISK1_BlockSize)
00062 #define RAMDISK1_AddressMode    (BOT_ADDR_MODE_BYTE)
00063 
00064 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00065 u32 RAMDISK_Read(u32 uId, u8 **pBuffer, u32 uAddress, u32 uLength);
00066 u32 RAMDISK_Write(u32 uId, u8 *pBuffer, u32 uAddress, u32 uLength);
00067 u32 RAMDISK_GetStatus(u32 uId, BOT_MediaSize_Typedef *pSizeInfo);
00068 void RAMDISK_Unmount(u32 uId);
